item.title: Five principles for a great travelling experience
item.description: When our plane was about to land at Bucharest International Airport, I was full of all kinds of questions and prejudices about Romania.

item.title: Two lessons I learned from writing eight papers
item.description: What have I learned from writing eight papers over the past four years?
